Reviews.Title: “Chic, clean rooms in Singapore's creative district”

Reviews.Content: stayed club night december little design hotel bathrooms probably feature tiled black white alice wonderland service strangely information packs wouldnt else hotel offer tell rooftop bar called yang lovely views perfect unwind day sight scarlett hotel ive stayed comparatively speaking definitely prefer club brighter airy scarlett little stuffy youre looking nice hip stay decent singapore club choice value money

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing - if you like to go to sleep at night, don't bother staying here.”
Reviews.Author: MrsandMrsC
Reviews.Content: excited staying hotelbut start finish disappointing card machine cards 4 ones pay ring home family theirs instead happened 3rd floor lovely trendy etc except club didnt stop pumping music 3am hear screams laughter heels stomping floor awful warned hand werent happy wed paid signature basic floor night worse music didnt stop till 4am cigarette smoke coming air vents noise unbearable phoned reception sent staff cotton wool balls didnt ear plugs pulled curtains try muffle didnt help sorry staff embarrassed im sorry theres honeymoon aside youre paying top dollar stay expect nights kip noticed stains actual gross told staff changed sheets complaining spent time hotel disapointed wish wed stayed else
